item.title: Kraken rolls out crypto-style, 24/7 perpetuals trading for tokenized U.S. stocks
item.description: The crypto exchange is bringing U.S. stocks closer to the crypto world, letting users trade derivatives of tokenized stocks around-the-clock and with 20x leverage.

item.title: Tether-backed Oobit adds crypto-to-bank transfers for local payment networks
item.description: The Tether-backed crypto payments app is expanding beyond retail spending with wallet-based off-ramps into domestic banking rails.

item.title: Adam Back's BSTR moving forward with public listing plans, hopes for April approval
item.description: Back remains optimistic despite the brutal price action in bitcoin and BTC treasury companies.

item.title: Here‚Äôs what happened in crypto today
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin traders 'excess loss-realization' may push BTC price below $44K
item.description: Bitcoin price dropped 25% in 2022 and 50% in 2018 after similar on-chain loss signals, a warning sign for BTC‚Äôs next move.

item.title: Wall Street‚Äôs big blockchain win: SEC gives WisdomTree the green light for instant, around-the-clock trading
item.description: The move adds momentum to the $10 billion large tokenized Treasury market led by BlackRock, Circle and others.

item.title: Bitcoin‚Äôs U.S. demand signal turns negative for a record 40 days
item.description: The indicator last printed positive on Jan. 15. Its failure to fully recover after a Feb. 5 rebound suggests U.S. demand remains structurally absent rather than temporarily paused.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta is planning stablecoin comeback in the second half of this year
item.description: The Facebook owner‚Äôs stablecoin integration involves planning a third party vendor to help administer stablecoin-based payments and a new wallet to be implemented, sources said.

item.title: Smarter Web adds $30M Coinbase credit line to speed Bitcoin buys after fundraises
item.description: The UK-listed Bitcoin treasury company says the facility will bridge equity settlements, enabling faster Bitcoin purchases during volatile markets.

item.title: Binance adds Ondo‚Äôs tokenized stocks in latest RWA push
item.description: Binance listed 10 of Ondo's tokenized stocks, ETFs and commodities on Binance Alpha with UAE regulatory approval, expanding crypto access to real-world assets.

item.title: Binance brings back tokenized stocks trading with Ondo Finance deal
item.description: The world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange has listed a batch of tokenized U.S. equities issued by Ondo Finance on its Binance Alpha platform, reviving stock trading push.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation starts staking ETH as client diversity concerns persist
item.description: Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs move to stake its own ETH, using minority clients and distributed infrastructure, throws fresh focus on how Ethereum‚Äôs staking landscape is evolving.

item.title: CoinDesk 20 performance update: index falls 2% as nearly all constituents decline
item.description: Internet Computer (ICP), up 1.2%, was the only gainer from Monday.

item.title: ‚ÄòBitcoin scarcity is dead‚Äô: Crypto executives push back on viral claim
item.description: Derivatives don‚Äôt mint new Bitcoin, analysts say, pushing back on viral claims that state paper BTC has broken the 21-million cap.

item.title: Solo Bitcoin miner bags over $200K block reward using rented hashrate
item.description: A solo Bitcoin miner hit a rare jackpot of more than $200,000 after validating a block through $75 worth of rented hashrate.

item.title: Solana DeFi Project Step Finance to Wind Down Weeks After $29M Hack
item.description: The Solana projects made the "difficult decision" to cease operations after January's treasury breach and subsequent failed rescue efforts.

item.title: Coinbase adds stock, ETF trading as it expands beyond crypto
item.description: The move pits Coinbase against Robinhood as it pushes to become an ‚Äúeverything exchange.‚Äù

item.title: Your AI is getting a bank account: MoonPay just gave bots the power to spend money
item.description: MoonPay Agents is a non-custodial, permissionless financial infrastructure for AI agents that move money.

item.title: 'If you‚Äôre not accumulating bitcoin at this stage, then when,' asks prominent analyst
item.description: Time, not price, is probably going to be more frustrating for bulls from here, wrote James Check, but bitcoin has been mostly de-risked at this point.

item.title: Morning Minute: Ethereum's Next Upgrade Features Censorship Resistance
item.description: Ethereum is going back to its cypherpunk ethos with FOCIL‚Äîbut it could create compliance issues down the line.

item.title: Vitalik sells 17K ETH in one month after earmarking $45M for privacy
item.description: Arkham data shows the Ethereum co-founder‚Äôs attributed wallets fell from about 241,000 ETH to 224,000 ETH this month.

item.title: Bitcoin's Path to Recovery 'Unclear' Amid Macro Headwinds
item.description: Bitcoin has flashed rare bottom signals, but macro headwinds are keeping a sustained recovery at bay, analysts told Decrypt.

item.title: Cipher Digital rebrands as it pivots from bitcoin mining to HPC, shares slide
item.description: Revenue and adjusted EPS come in below estimates as company leans into large scale data center buildout.

item.title: Canton advances cross-border repo to free up $300 trillion assets via tokenization
item.description: A group of global financial firms tokenized a repo transaction with U.K. government bonds for the first time.

item.title: Stablecoin stagnation, tariffs a headwind for Bitcoin prices, analysts say
item.description: Tariff shocks led to a capital rotation from crypto into precious metals and tokenized commodities, as analysts warn that the thin crypto market liquidity is limiting a wider recovery.

item.title: Over 400,000 BTC bought between $60k and $70k during bitcoin‚Äôs latest downturn
item.description: Glassnode data shows a 43% surge in supply clustered in the $60K to $70K range following bitcoin‚Äôs 50% decline from its October all time high.

item.title: Bitcoin teeters near $63,000 as pippin's rally shows froth remains
item.description: Your day-ahead look for Feb. 24, 2026

item.title: The ghost of the iPhone: Why Michael Saylor thinks bitcoin is mirroring Apple‚Äôs legendary ‚Äòvalley of despair‚Äô
item.description: Michael Saylor compared bitcoin‚Äôs 45% drawdown to Apple‚Äôs 2013 slump, arguing that enduring deep corrections is part of every successful technology investment.

item.title: Crypto markets bleed as bitcoin hovers above liquidation zone
item.description: Bitcoin dropped to $63,000 as the dollar climbed and equities weakened. A break below $60,000 risks further liquidations and a slide toward $52,500.

item.title: Telegram CEO faces Russia probe over allegations of terrorism facilitation
item.description: Russian authorities claim the Telegram messenger refused to remove 155,000 channels flagged for illegal content, according to multiple media reports.

item.title: Hashgraph Group launches Hedera-based tool for EU digital product passports
item.description: Hashgraph Group has launched a blockchain-based supply-chain traceability solution ahead of the EU‚Äôs Digital Product Passport requirements, some of which take effect beginning in 2027.

item.title: Bitcoin market enters full capitulation as price dips below $63K
item.description: Panic selling by short-term holders, combined with the RSI near record lows, suggests that BTC could be transitioning into a full capitulation regime.

item.title: Step Finance shuts operations after $27 million January hack
item.description: Step is working on a buyback for holders of native token STEP based on a snpashot of holdings and value prior to the incident.

item.title: Arizona Senate Advances Bill to Create Digital Assets Reserve Fund
item.description: The bill would allow Arizona to hold Bitcoin, XRP, Digibyte, stablecoins, and NFTs in a state-managed crypto reserve.

item.title: Putting the treasury to work: The Ethereum Foundation just staked 70,000 ETH to fund its future
item.description: The staking commenced with a 2,016 ETH deposit, and uses Dirk and Vouch, open-source validator tools developed by infrastructure firm Attestant

item.title: Bitcoin ETF sell-off is ‚Äòpurification‚Äô of bull case, investor says
item.description: Bitcoin ETF investors have recorded sustained outflows this year, but EMJ Capital‚Äôs Eric Jackson argues a longer-term institutional buyer base could emerge.

item.description: The transaction gives Cipher a major shareholding in the Singapore-based company.

item.title: Coinbase USDC revenue may multiply 7x as payments grow, Bloomberg says
item.description: Bloomberg Intelligence said Coinbase‚Äôs USDC revenue may jump sevenfold, as Congress weighs a ban on stablecoin rewards that could reshape how that money is earned.

item.description: The stablecoin payments company has hired JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs and Jefferies, according to Bloomberg.

item.title: RedotPay weighs US IPO that could raise $1B at over $4B valuation: Report
item.description: RedotPay secured $194 million in 2025 across three funding rounds, reaching a valuation above $1 billion and drawing backing from crypto- and venture-focused investors.
